attributes.action: Save the Great British Pub From extinction
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Save the Great British Pub from extinction by allowing pubs with more than one room to designate one as a smoking room and for open plan and single room pubs to have the choice to be either a smoking or smoke free pub.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
